Package it.polimi.model

Class CommonGoalCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.model.GoalCard
it.polimi.model.CommonGoalCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommonGoalCard1, CommonGoalCard10, CommonGoalCard11, CommonGoalCard12, CommonGoalCard2, CommonGoalCard3, CommonGoalCard4, CommonGoalCard5, CommonGoalCard6, CommonGoalCard7, CommonGoalCard8, CommonGoalCard9
public abstract class CommonGoalCard extends GoalCard implements Serializable
The abstract class CommonGoalCard provides all the behaviour that are common between the 12 common goal cards
Author:
Nicola Siniscalchi
